asset.title: Flowmaster American Thunder Cat-back System 2009-2016 Toyota Tundra - 817664
asset.description:

Flowmaster Part #817664

Applications:
2009-2016 Toyota Tundra with 4.6L or 5.7L V8 engine. 145" Wheelbase Models Only.

Features:
Flowmaster's American Thunder cat-back exhaust system for the 2009-2016 Toyota Tundra pickup trucks with the 5.7L or 4.6L V8 engines is perfect for the person looking for an aggressive sound level with all of the performance benefits that you would expect from Flowmaster. This DOR/DOS (Dual Out Rear, Dual Out Side) bolt on 409S stainless steel system features dual 2.50? tailpipes and 3.50? polished stainless steel tips. This system is designed to fit regular cab/long bed, double cab/short bed and CrewMax models. The exhaust system is manufactured in the USA and is covered by Flowmaster's Lifetime Limited Warranty. Designed for an easy fit, this system includes all necessary parts and hardware for installation.
✓ Stainless Steel Construction
✓ Multiple Exit Styles Provided in Kit
✓ Aggressive Performance Tone
✓ Lifetime Limited Warranty
✓ Made in the USA
